messages.title: Why I'm Voting for Fabian on May 7th
messages.content: Inderjit Singh Gill endorses Fabian Hamilton, reflecting on his previous work and involvement with the community.

messages.title: A New Park for North East Leeds
messages.content: Development of a new park on the site of former Yorkshire Bank Playing Fields is underway, with involvement from Fabian Hamilton.

messages.title: We're Definitely Voting Labour on May 7th
messages.content: Catherine Hall and Louis Hall-Thompson endorse Labour, sharing their personal story of how Fabian Hamilton helped resolve a housing issue.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: We'll Build 200,000 New Homes Every Year for the Next 5 Years
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour commits to building thousands of new homes that are low-carbon and affordable, aiming to alleviate housing issues like high prices, steep mortgage payments, and poor quality, damp homes.

mentions.candidate: Fabian Hamilton is mentioned in endorsements and his involvement in local projects.

housing.content: Labour plans to build 200,000 new homes every year for the next five years to keep up with demand and help people who cannot afford the high prices.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fabian Hamilton has worked on various community projects, including the development of a new park and assisting individuals with housing issues.

endorsements.endorsement: Inderjit Singh Gill endorses Fabian Hamilton, highlighting Hamilton's efforts and approachability.
Catherine Hall and Louis Hall-Thompson share their positive experience with Fabian Hamilton's immediate action and assistance during a housing issue.

images.caption: Image of Fabian Hamilton with supporters.
Construction machinery at the site of a new park.
Fabian Hamilton with Catherine Hall and Louis Hall-Thompson.
